title: Tony Quiroga (Car and Driver)
description:
Tony Quiroga is the Print Director at Car and Driver magazine. He's a fast driver, gets the best cars, and tends to bring some snark to the show. https://www.caranddriver.com/author/7065/tony-quiroga/

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/Rzfm6pRB7wk

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
